description: Runtime configuration for output, visualization, and monitoring settings

material_flow._description: Controls how materials move through the system
material_flow._flow_mode_note: Material flow strategy: 'pull' (stations request items) or 'push' (stations send items)

output._description: Controls which data files are exported to the output folder
output._path_note: Base directory for all simulation outputs

core_outputs._eventlog_note: Master event log with all activities; required for export_object_lookup
core_outputs._case_table_note: Summary table of all products entering the system
core_outputs._output_table_note: Details of all components/products leaving the system

derived_outputs._description: Metrics and data computed from the eventlog (comp files)
derived_outputs._object_lookup_note: Object reference table derived from eventlog
derived_outputs._station_stats_absolute_note: Station time metrics in minutes (busy, blocked, idle, failed, closed)

parameter_extraction._product_parameters_note: Extract product structure metrics and portfolio parameters
parameter_extraction._system_parameters_note: Extract system configuration and capacity parameters

debug_outputs._merged_config_note: Saves complete configuration used for run
debug_outputs._debug_log_note: Creates detailed text log of simulation decisions

visualization._progress_bar_note: Shows real-time simulation progress in console
visualization._structure_note: Displays factory network graph after simulation (requires matplotlib)
visualization._timeseries_note: Shows inventory and throughput graphs after simulation (requires matplotlib)

display._description: Console output after each simulation run
display._technical_performance_note: Simulation runtime and event generation stats

monitoring._description: Controls data collection frequency during simulation
monitoring._frequency_factor_note: --------Divides simulation time for monitoring interval (higher = less frequent)

performance._optimize_note: --------Uses faster state tracking without history (disables detailed state logs)
